name: KNIGHT SHOT / PAU BLESA AND ALBA ELÍAS
name_original: KNIGHT SHOT / PAU BLESA AND ALBA ELÍAS
description:
KNIGHT SHOT / PAU BLESA AND ALBA ELÍAS is a game developed by ae_robas. It was originally released in 2020.
KNIGHT SHOT / PAU BLESA AND ALBA ELÍAS is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
